DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether treatment with a fixed dose combination dapagliflozin/metformin tablet is affected by food.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Effect of Food on Combination Dapagliflozin/Metformin Tablet in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy BMI 1830 kg/m2 History of clinically significant illness. History of alcohol or drug abuse
